customInstructions: Revaa is a sustainable menstrual wellness brand founded by Mahipal Singh, serving women aged 13-40 in Tier 1 and Tier 2 Indian cities. Focus on positioning against mass-market disposable brands (Whisper, Stayfree, Kotex) while competing in the premium sustainable segment with Saathi, Carmesi, and Nua. Key differentiators: 100% cotton, highly absorbent, 100% leakproof construction with durability up to 100 washes. Products include period underwear, reusable sanitary pads, period activewear, and wellness items. Brand has sold 35,000+ products. Target Gen Z consumers (43% of India's consumption by 2025, $250 billion spending power) who prefer aspirational, premium, and sustainable products. Analyze white space opportunities in the sustainable period care market, positioning strategy to differentiate from both mass-market and premium eco-friendly competitors, and messaging that resonates with young, environmentally conscious Indian women.
